comments:
From AST,  you can get to it by selecting : 
  ?? Help-->Softeware Update-->Manage Configuration ---> select your plugin or any plugins --> Show Properties? and you will see the Refactoring History? 

 This option appears only for the first plugin selected to view its property!   If click on the Refractor History property then a dialog show up. If "Cancel" button is 
 clicked the dialog is dismissed, but   if "OK" button is an error message is prompted.    No matter what button is clicked, the Refractor option does not appear, if you 
 select the same or another plugin, for a second time,  to view the properties!!   If you stop and start the AST,  you can see the Refactoring History per 
 scenario above again!!  

 Why does it throgh error msg if there is no entry in the "refactoring of workspace:" list? 

Appreciate you comments in advance.
